abstract: David Baker, performer, composer and distinguished professor emeritus who brought jazz studies into academia, dies at age 84.

headline.print_headline: David Baker, 84, Jazz Master, Composer and Educator
headline.main: David Baker, Who Helped Bring Jazz Studies Into the Academy, Dies at 84

snippet: Mr. Baker, a performer, composer and educator helped bring jazz studies into the academy at a time when the ivory tower considered the field infra dig.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Baker, a performer, composer and educator helped bring jazz studies into the academy at a time when the ivory tower considered the field infra dig.
